entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
